or pair it with jeans for a more casual everyday vibe the style is timeless and perfect for all occasions **sizes ** the following are the fits chest measurements the garment is designed with a positive ease so finished measurements are larger all measurements are included in a chart and schematic in the pattern xs 32-33 s 34-36 m 38-40 l 42-44 xl 46-48 2x 50-52 3x 54-56 **instructions included for lengthening the torso ** **purchase the kit here 3 ** lion brand has a full kit of the summit men s sweater vest available on their website the kit includes your choice of 4 colorways and a printed copy of the pattern below **yarn notes ** lion brand jean s yarn in stovepipe was used for the sample in the photos i ve listed several other lion brand yarns that will work great as
